s0597: Winter, Jin Hou assembled feudal lords at Wen, wished lead them court Zhou.
s0598: Strength not able, feared have break away, then sent people speak Zhou Xiang Wang hunted at He Yang.
s0599: Ren Shen, then led feudal lords court wang at Jian Tu.
s0600: Kong Qiu read history records to Wen Gong, said 'feudal lords no summon wang', 'wang hunted He Yang', Spring Autumn concealed it.
s0601: Ding Chou, feudal lords surrounded Xu.
s0602: Cao Bo minister someone persuaded Jin Hou said: 'Qi Huan Gong united feudal lords country different surname, now lord for assembly extinguish same surname.
s0605: United feudal lords extinguish brothers, not ritual.'
s0606: Jin Hou pleased, restored Cao Bo.
s0607: Then Jin began made three rows.
s0608: Xun Lin Fu led middle row, Xian Hu led right row, Xian Mie led left row.
s0609: Seventh year, Jin Wen Gong, Qin Mu Gong together surrounded Zheng, with its without ritual at Wen Gong perished pass time, and Cheng Pu time Zheng assisted Chu.
s0610: Surrounded Zheng, wished obtain Shu Zhan.
s0612: Zheng held Shu Zhan informed Jin.
s0613: Jin said: 'Must obtain Zheng lord then sweet heart.'
s0614: Zheng feared, then secretly sent made told Qin Mu Gong said: 'Perish Zheng thick Jin, at Jin obtained, Qin not for profit.
s0615: Lord why not resolve Zheng, obtain as east road exchange?'
s0618: Ninth year winter, Jin Wen Gong died, son Xiang Gong Huan established.
s0619: This year Zheng Bo also died.
s0620: Zheng people or sold their country to Qin, Qin Mu Gong sent troops went attacked Zheng.
s0621: Twelfth month, Qin troops passed our suburb.
s0622: Xiang Gong first year spring, Qin army passed Zhou, without ritual, Wang Sun Man criticized it.
s0623: Troops arrived Hua, Zheng merchant Xian Gao about market at Zhou, met them, with twelve oxen labored Qin army.
s0624: Qin army alarmed returned, extinguished Hua left.
s0625: Jin Xian Zhen said: 'Qin Bo not used Jian Shu, returned their crowd hearts, this able attack.'
s0626: Luan Zhi said: 'Not repaid previous lord grant at Qin, attack it, not able.'
s0627: Xian Zhen said: 'Qin insulted our orphan, attacked our same surname, what virtue repay?'
s0630: Fourth month, defeated Qin army at Xiao, captured Qin three generals Meng Ming Shi, Xi Qi Shu, Bai Yi Bing returned.
s0632: Wen Gong wife Qin woman, told Xiang Gong said: 'Qin wished obtain their three generals execute them.'
s0634: Xian Zhen heard it, told Xiang Gong said: 'Calamity born.'
s0636: Qin generals crossed river, already in boat, knocked head thanked, finally not returned.
s0637: After three years, Qin indeed sent Meng Ming attacked Jin, repaid Xiao defeat, took Jin Wang returned.
s0638: Fourth year, Qin Mu Gong greatly raised troops attacked us, crossed river, took Wang Guan, buried Xiao corpses left.
s0639: Jin feared, not dared exit, then walled defended.
s0640: Fifth year, Jin attacked Qin, took Xin Cheng, repaid Wang Guan campaign.
s0641: Sixth year, Zhao Shuai Cheng Zi, Luan Zhen Zi, Jiu Ji Zi Fan, Huo Bo all died.
s0642: Zhao Dun replaced Zhao Shuai held government.
s0643: Seventh year eighth month, Xiang Gong died.
